FuncDef: This commands sets the internal OSPF delay to allow for the accumulation of multiple LSA so OSPF messages can be sent as efficiently as possible. Thelsa-accumulatetimer applies to all LSAs, except Type 1 and Type 2 LSAs which are sent immediately.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the LSA accumulation delay in milliseconds. Values-0 to 1000.
